item.title: Intro to C++
item.description: C++ is a statically typed, compiled language, and it can be used across multiple platforms. Moreover, C++ is a great programming language for high-performance computing as it provides the user with much control over memory and system resources. It is also great for object-oriented programming and therefore it is used for a wide range of applications. Creating a C++ program and some basic syntax Write your code using a text editor and save as filename.
